entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
